welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wausau, a charming city known for its beautiful natural scenery and rich history. We invite you to explore our vibrant downtown, outdoor recreational activities, and friendly community while you enjoy your stay here.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Central Wisconsin Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Central Wisconsin Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free wifi network while waiting for their flight.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Stevens Point Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Stevens Point Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.
